Chapter.Heading: Finding and retrieving single semigroups
Chapter.Section:
Finding and retrieving single semigroups In this section all the internal functions used in the small semigroups library are described.
WARNING: some of the functions in this section can alter the files containing the library of small semigroups. If the library ceases to function, please download it again.
<#Include Label="SmallSemigroupEltFamily"> <#Include Label="SmallSemigroupEltType"> <#Include Label="SmallSemigroupType"> <#Include Label="DATA2TO7"> <#Include Label="DATA8"> <#Include Label="BLUEPRINT_MATS"> <#Include Label="3NIL_DATA"> <#Include Label="GENERATE_BLUEPRINT_MATS"> <#Include Label="READ_3NIL_DATA"> <#Include Label="READ_MOREDATA2TO8"> <#Include Label="MOREDATA2TO8">
